divs: sighting detailsi had walked out on to my front stoop to smoke a cigarette & heard a strange noise not unlike a jet engine but whirring instead of that linear scream. then the object came into view from behind, in-between my home & the two story home to the right(there was never any question of what it was); it looked like a black disk with a silver seven pointed pentagram on the domed\bubbled bottom with several randomly appearing rectangle red lights & one bar shaped light at the end of each point outlining the circle. i was instantly very happy, kind hearted, sexually aroused to a flash erection, loving & appreciative of life(not my usual but has not left yet) the object continued across the street, over the high school drive-way then did a 1\4 circle curve out of my sight behind a very small hill. i felt like my dog died for a split second, saw a white strobe for about four flashes from the other side of the hill & have felt a bit high on life with a touch of horney anxiety. for a few days now & a reaccuring thought that a 'reunion' is approaching. it only seemed to take..maybe 30 seconds but my cig. had burned away & out completely. unfortunately i was much too passive and "love drunk" to think of looking at the time again but it seemed a good deal quieter & i felt amazing like that "oh thank 'god' it's the perfect gift right on time let's f**k to celebrate" feeling if that makes sence? i was silent for a-while, finally told my friend today & he said "report it" so here.

Summary: Walked out front to smoke passed me @45Â° angle from back 30yrds off ground felt calm & grateful
